titleStmt.title: Honoured Sir, that the works of mercy and charity are the fruits of piety, is the undoubted tenent of all Christians, ...
titleStmt.author: Odling, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Edward Odling, iatrʹos, Solicitor for the said Corporation.
Title from opening lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
